EmailTemplate.name: Lead Seeker - New Lead received-MyPost Business Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post product or service enquiry - {!Lead.Lead_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Product or service enquiry
Reference number {!Lead.Lead_Number__c}
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
You recently spoke with us about MyPost Business and how it may benefit your business, in case you didn’t have time to complete the registration, you can register for MyPost Business here <https://auspost.com.au/mypost-business>.
If you have any questions or need help registering please call us on 13 11 18.
Thank you, Australia Post
This email was sent by Australia Post. Australia Post does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference. Privacy Notice This privacy notice outlines in general terms how Australia Post handles your personal information in respect of the Snap It (‘the App’). Personal information is collected about you by Australia Post to fulfil services facilitated through the App. These services include the fulfilment of your enquiry or compliant, the identification and remediation of hazards or incidents related to the Australia Post network or operations and/or the fulfilment of a lead generation enquiry. Information obtained through the App may also be used to send you correspondence pertaining to your query/complaint, follow up lead generating enquiries (including providing commercial correspondence (unless you have unsubscribed to it) and to provide service support. If you provide the personal information of others to Australia Post it is your responsibility to advise those individuals that you have provided the information to Australia Post. If your personal information is not collected we may not be able communicate with you about your enquiry, services facilitated through this App or other Australia Post products or services you may be interested in. Your personal information may be disclosed to contracted service providers that assist in fulfilling the Program (such as information technology support and service support operations). Some of these providers are located in Japan and the United States. The Australia Post Group ‘Privacy Policy’ contains more information and also how you can seek access to, and correction of, your personal information held by Australia Post. It also explains how you can complain about a breach of your privacy and how your complaint will be dealt with. For more information, please refer to the Australia Post Group Privacy Policy at: auspost.com.au/privacy. Help & support | Terms & conditions | Privacy policy
